storyInfo: Blacknight finds herself living an all-too-rare easy life aboard the Rhodes Island landship, but her mind still lingers on her days in the barrens.

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.options: Mulberry, your thoughts as her guide?

attributes.content: D-Doctor, I think, given how straightforward Blacknight always is, she must've left right after handing in the form.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.options: You sound disgruntled about her.; So you let her leave?

attributes.content: Mm... but my opinion doesn't matter much, Doctor. What do you think?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.options: If she's gone, there's nothing more to discuss.

attributes.content: Something tells me you're not too happy with this yourself...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.options: You're overthinking it.; *cough* I appreciate your concern.
Do you know why she decided to leave?; Still, I'm curious what her reasons were.

attributes.content: I-I'm not sure myself.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: *sigh*... I thought she'd gotten used to life here. Though she did seem uncomfortable when we first met.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Her condition wasn't too stable at that point, so Medical suggested she remain aboard as an official operator so they could check up on her at any time, which she agreed to.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: That's when they assigned me as her guide, to get her used to the ins and outs of the landship...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: So... you're my captain here? You think you can protect me with those stubby limbs of yours?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: B-Blacknight, I may not be a match for you physically, but if we ever run into danger, I'll do everything I can to keep you safe.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Heh, someone's confident. Good show.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: ...Am I gonna be living with you in this room then?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Your condition isn't bad enough to require admission to Medical, but we still can't leave you unobserved yet.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: So I'll be living with you to make it more convenient to give you check-ups.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Man, can't we open some windows in here? I need some breeze.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Is it too stuffy for you? I can turn on the air conditioner.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: How's that?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hmm... a little ehh, if you ask me.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Are you feeling uncomfortable?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I guess? Probably down to my health.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Sorry, um, excuse me.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hey, what're you up to?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Your forehead temperature feels normal...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: We can visit Medical after dinner, and carry out a detailed examination.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Er... why exactly? I'm basically fine.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Are you sure? You still seem uneasy.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: 'Course I'm sure.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: A-Alright then...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Oh, I almost forgot to give you this.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: And... what is it?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Talismans.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I can see that. Little too many for one string though, yeah?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Well... I was thinking the more I add, the more effective it'll be.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Look, I'm gonna be upfront—I wouldn't be caught dead carrying that mess everywhere I go.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: You don't need to take it with you, you can just hang it in your wardrobe.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Pass. Reeks of incense. It'll get on my clothes too.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I-I'm sorry, I didn't even consider that!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Tch... That's the thing with pampered little princesses like you. Such a pain to deal with.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Oh dear, she's so hard to get along with... No, whatever else, this is my mission. I need to make sure I'm on good terms with her.)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: So... is there anywhere you'd like to see? I can show you around?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Don't bother. And don't follow me either.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: 'But' my arse.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Blacknight, wait!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: For the longest time, I thought she was just a loner by nature. And coupled with being fresh aboard, it made sense she was cautious.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: ...But now I realize, she simply didn't like it here.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.options: But she didn't leave straight away.; Still, why only choose to leave now?

attributes.content: There was one time last month, when we wrapped up a field support mission and came back from the wilds. Not long after, she gave me her application to resign from formal operator status and return to being a cooperative contractor.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I think what happened out there might've made her dissatisfied with us.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Or maybe... I was the problem. Maybe I'm the reason she couldn't stand being here.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.options: Cool it. That's nonsense.; Trust me, she wouldn't think like that.

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.options: So what went down out there anyway?

attributes.content: I've been wondering that myself, honestly. As far as I could tell, it wasn't particularly distressing. I found it all very fascinating, actually, even pleasant.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I thought we'd grown quite a bit closer, too, after that mission.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I even felt like she was finally fitting in here.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: First things first. Follow my directions while we're out there, and don't drag me down.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: But—I'm the captain?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Could you beat me in a fight?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Have you lived in the barrens longer than I have?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: So why should I listen to your orders?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: ...Pfft. Hahahaha.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Wha— What's so funny, all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Nothing, just thought it was hilarious watching your brain lock up in real time like that.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: So when you said...?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Just pulling your leg. Mission's almost over as is and you're still all wound up, stuck inside a tent all day. Had to yank you out for a walk.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Oh. And here I thought...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Thought I was speaking my mind there?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Tell you the truth, it would've been, not too long ago.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: ...So I wasn't just imagining things.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: But I was being unfair, wasn't I? We've been around each other plenty now, and every little thing you do's proven just how amazing you really are.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I-I'm very flattered, but for you to suddenly start praising me like this...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Why so awkward? You earned a thumb's up, so you get one. I still remember that old woman we'd all written off, but you found a way to save her against all odds.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I couldn't have done it without everyone's help.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Stop quibbling and take the compliment. I'm calling you amazing because you are. Don't you doubt that.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Here, catch. Give it a try.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: The hell? How'd you miss a pass from that close?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Whatever, you can have the other one.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: D-Don't pick it back up! You shouldn't eat fruit off the ground, it's unsanitary! You'll ruin your stomach.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Stuff that, it's just a bit of broken skin. Still good.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: At least wipe it off with your sleeve.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: ...Th-This is amazing. I've never had fruit like this before.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Once, me and my mates were taking a route that passed through a forest by a river.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: The trees were full of fruit like this. Each of us left with a giant heap we'd picked, all crammed into our bags.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Never came across any again after that. Surprised there's so many growing around here.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: We can pick a few more to take back, to let everyone try some.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I didn't drag you out today to go fruit-picking.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Oh, I-I didn't realize... Was there something else, then? I thought we were just outside for a walk.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: What're you sweating buckets for? Follow me.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Ah—don't—don't pull me!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Where are...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Shh, quiet. There's a massive bugger tucked inside this cave. Don't scare her.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Why did you take me here? This is so dangerous.)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (Dangerous? You're safe as houses with me, okay?)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (My professor used to say we should steer clear of wild animals as much as we can while working in the field.)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (Shut it. Who cares what your professor said? Watch carefully. It's coming out.)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Subtle stirrings emanate from the cave. Mulberry squints, trying to catch a closer look.
But after a long while, the stirrings abate, leaving the bushes in front of the opening to rustle in the wind, swaying and shuffling as they do.
Just as she's about to lose patience and tell her companion that they should head back to camp, a wild beast emerges from the cave without fanfare.
Its flesh is rugged, its hide sleek, and with a yawn it bares its coarse tusks for all to see, easily capable of mauling the throats of its prey.
(That—That's a big one...)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (I-I'm getting scared now, Blacknight, we—we should... head back.)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (Relax, she won't notice us from this distance. Besides, getting up now would just draw her attention here.)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (B-But I...)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (Hold tight, just a little longer.)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: The sheer fearsomeness of the beast makes Mulberry involuntarily bury her face halfway into her arms, leaving only a pair of eyes peeking out, furtively taking in the sight of it sniffing about its cave's entrance.
Seemingly assured no danger lurks nearby, it settles down and lets out a rumbling howl, as if calling for something.
Sure enough, a beastling soon waddles out from the cave, its gait unsteady.
After just a few steps, it tumbles heavily—perhaps the mud is too slick—and knocks its head on the senior beast's hind legs.
The beast isn't the least bit perturbed, simply craning its head around and lapping at the beastling's head, encouraging it to get up again.
(Go on. You can do it, little one.)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (Wow, wooow, he did it!)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (He—He's so cute.)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (I was looking for food around here a while back and found her pregnant. By my count, I figured the baby'd be born by now.)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (That's so sweet. He'll have nothing to fear with his mom by his side.)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (Look. They're about to go.)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: (Go where?)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (They need to stuff themselves while it's still autumn, so they can make it through the freezing winter okay.)
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Alright, enough gawking, they're out of sight now. About time we headed back too.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I've never seen anything like that before, never ever. Oh, no, I did see a documentary once, but it's not like that counts.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I've never seen something so stunning with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Stunning? It's the most normal thing there is.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: You must've seen sights this wonderful all the time where you used to live. Otherwise you wouldn't say that.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: ...You're right. Saw it all over.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Remember to write it down.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Eh? Write what down?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Remember to put it in the report we're sending back to the landship. It's a very special kind of experience. It deserves a mention.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: ...Got it. Will do.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: And don't put it off until the very last day, either.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Alright, alright, get a move on. Let's go pick the rest of those fruits. Bet everyone at camp'll want to try some.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I think that must be what angered her. It's my fault for not reading the room, for spoiling the mood like that. I'm sure all the paperwork and regulations go completely against her style.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: *sigh* What now, Doctor? Blacknight's already gone, and I only realized after the fact. I didn't even get the chance to apologize.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.options: Don't worry, it's not your fault.;Don't regret not saying sorry. Regret not saying goodbye.

attributes.content: Regardless, it's too late now.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: What're you two muttering about in here? Hey, Doctor, has my application gone through? It's been days already. Why haven't I heard a peep?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.options: We're in the middle of discussing it.;You should've knocked first.

attributes.content: Hmph. You act like you're my nan.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Blacknight, oh... I thought you'd left, I-I was wondering how I never even got to say goodbye...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: What? Don't you lot have a rule about submitting a report and waiting for approval before leaving?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: ...Um, I thought you were fed up with all the rules?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Eh, I've spent enough time here to work out why you have 'em. I don't like them, but I can adapt.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Besides... I've got friends here. Can't just vanish without a word.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.options: At least tell us why you're leaving.;Why aren't you a fan of this place?

attributes.content: That's right! If there's anything bothering you, you're absolutely free to mention it, and we'll help you sort it out.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: It's not the place, that's not the issue.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: If not the place, then... the people here? Y-You don't want to stay because you're s-sick of me, aren't you...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Never even crossed my mind.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: You don't hate me?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: You kidding? You're amazing. Responsible, professional, you name it. Would've left ages ago if you didn't need my help.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I did?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Yeah. You remember that day, right?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Oh, Blacknight. What brings you here? Are you feeling unwell?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: No, sorry, 'scuse me. Is Mulberry in?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: She is. Are you... waiting for her?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I heard she finished her mission and came back yesterday, but I still haven't seen her yet. Something wrong? She hurt?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Oh, not at all.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: So what's she been up to?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: We brought back more patients than expected for this rescue mission. Medical's been all hands on deck, so we've temporarily transferred Mulberry here for urgent treatment of our less critical patients.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: How's that fair? She just got back from a field mission.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: She insisted. She was originally meant to be coming back the next day, anyway.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Whoof...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: So you're worried about her?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Why do you look so surprised about that?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: No, it's just that she's always so gloomy whenever she brings you up. She seems to think you don't like being around her.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Hey, I never said that.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: That's good, then. We're all hoping you'll be able to help her out more.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Help her out? With what?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: You can totally trust her on the professional front, but she's still young, and doesn't have much experience with wasteland survival. But now that she has you, you can teach her as you go.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: So is she done with work right now?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: She should've been done forever ago...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*... sir, you're wounded... please stay still...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Oh, gosh. She's just fallen asleep up against the clothes locker. The exhaustion must've gotten to her.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: What's she nattering about? She can't even sleep easy...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Helmet.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Mreep!
attributes.name: Helmet

attributes.content: Put her under properly.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Shrrp—
attributes.name: Helmet

attributes.content: (Lets out a long, slow breath.)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Say, mind if I lend a hand here? I'll carry her on my back. Won't do her any good sleeping here.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Oh, uhh, okay.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Seriously, you give me nothing but trouble.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: So you're the one who brought me back to the dorms that day.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Who else? It's thanks to Helmet you slept so sound that night, y'know.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I had it all wrong...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: You just love overthinking things.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.options: I bet it took more than just overthinking.;It's your fault too, for not being clearer.

attributes.content: Sorry, I'd never gotten to know any girls like you before.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Didn't mean to make you worry.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: It's okay, we—we sorted out the misunderstanding, so, um, please stay! I've learned so much here, and I'm sure I can help you keep your illness under control.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Thing is, I just... wanna go back to the barrens. Life out there suits me better.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.options: No problem. There's always more fieldwork.;You can specialize in barrenlands field missions.

attributes.content: Nah, it's just not the same. I know, I know, I don't have to worry about the basics here, and I can get drugs for my sickness. I've made new friends, learned new tricks, the whole shebang.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Ought to know a good thing when I see it...
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: But sometimes, I wake up at night, and I stare at the ceiling and it's all white. No moons, no stars, no chirping, and I just feel hollow inside.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: My instincts are shouting it, my heart's screaming it, and my thinker's torturing me over it.
attributes.name: Blacknight
Blacknight
attributes.content: It's just the simplest thing—

attributes.name: Blacknight
attributes.content: I need to live somewhere I can see the sky when I look up.
attributes.joined: It's just the simplest thing—I need to live somewhere I can see the sky when I look up.

attributes.content: Do you... Do you know just how bad your health is, Blacknight? How will the sky do anything to protect you?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I don't agree to this! I do not approve your application! Doctor, please don't approve her application!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Listen to me, Mulberry. I know I'm skint for choices. That's why I'm choosing what I want most, honest.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Remember that beast I took you to see?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Mm... It's never left my mind.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Out in the barrens, there's plenty more like her. Loads and loads.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Few years back, I came across a slumberfoot. She was a tough little cub. The moment I saw her, I decided I wanted to tame her.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: But I tried a few times to get close and communicate with her, and she kept refusing. Whenever she saw me, she just scurried straight away. Tasty food, a soft bed, nothing could make her care.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Then one time, by accident, she got hurt by her own prey. I saved her, took her back to camp, and treated her.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: As she healed up, gradually, that tension she had around me gave way to a new familiarity.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Thought I'd managed to tame her, so I stopped keeping an eye on her round the clock.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: But after a short hunting trip, I came back to camp and she was gone. Left nothing but the little cap I knitted her.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: I was furious. Imagine how hard it is to even get a hold of yarn in the barrens... I thought she loved that cap.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: So I followed her tracks. Went after her.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: And when I found her, she was rolling about in the dunes, absolutely grimy. But she was happy as could be, the happiest I'd ever seen her.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: So I just turned around and left. In that instant, I learned. She didn't belong to me. She belonged to those dunes, to that huge old desert.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.options: Blacknight, I approve your application to depart.
You are once again an RI collaborative operator. You can go.

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: If you have to leave... then—then at least, remember to bring enough medicine before you go.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Come on. Come on, connect.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hello? Is anyone listening? This is Operator Mulberry! I've encountered an exceptionally bad sandstorm en route to a mission in Lungmen! Requesting urgent support!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hello? Is anyone there?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Is this really it? This can't be... No...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (I'm going to die here.)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I feel so hungry. So tired. So terrible.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Nobody's coming, are they...? There's nobody to come.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: *whimper*... Mom... Dad...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I can't... hold on any longer...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Mreep—mreep—
(Who... Who's that licking me? Uwgh, that tickles...)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: If you're awake, hurry up and open your eyes.
(I can't see properly. That voice sounds so familiar...)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: What're you doing just squinting there?
Oh, you got sand in your eyes.
(Blows)
Give me a blink. That any better?
Strewth, what would you do without me?
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Waah—
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hey, hey, what're you hugging me so hard for?!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: Come on, let go!
attributes.name: Blacknight

attributes.content: ...I missed you so, so much.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Alright, alright... fine, just a little. I'll let you hug me just a little longer.
attributes.name: Blacknight
